RESUME_TIPS: Emphasize experience with **Big Data frameworks** like Hadoop, Spark, or Kafka in your project descriptions to align with the job description.
Highlight your experience with **Cloud Platforms** (AWS, Azure, or Google Cloud) by adding specific projects or experiences to your resume.
Include **Deep Learning** frameworks such as TensorFlow or PyTorch in your skills section to showcase relevant expertise.
Detail your experience with **MLOps** and **Model Monitoring** techniques in project descriptions to demonstrate production-level skills.
Add projects or experiences related to **Time Series Forecasting** to match the preferred qualifications.
Quantify achievements by adding metrics to your project descriptions to highlight the impact of your work, such as **reducing manual screening time by 90%**.
Expand on projects involving **Data Pipelines** to showcase your ability to develop and implement scalable data processing solutions.
Create a dedicated section for **Certifications and Academic Achievements** to emphasize your continuous learning and expertise in the field.
Mention experience with **Data Modeling** in the context of your projects or experience to demonstrate your analytical capabilities.
Clearly state your proficiency level (e.g., Beginner, Intermediate, Expert) for each skill listed in the **Skills** section to provide a clearer understanding of your abilities.

Hadoop.DESCRIPTION: This specialization covers the fundamentals of Big Data, including Hadoop and MapReduce, and teaches how to apply these technologies to real-world problems.

Hadoop.COURSE_NAME: Taming Big Data with Apache Hadoop and Spark
Hadoop.DESCRIPTION: Learn how to use Apache Hadoop and Spark to process and analyze large datasets, covering setup, configuration, and basic programming models.
A comprehensive tutorial for beginners covering the basics of Hadoop and its ecosystem, including HDFS, MapReduce, and YARN.

Spark.COURSE_NAME: Big Data Analysis with Scala and Spark
Spark.DESCRIPTION: Learn how to use Apache Spark for big data analysis using Scala, covering data ingestion, transformation, and analysis techniques.
An introductory course to Apache Spark, covering the core concepts, architecture, and basic programming techniques for data processing.

Spark.COURSE_NAME: Spark and Python for Big Data with PySpark
Spark.DESCRIPTION: A comprehensive tutorial on using PySpark for big data processing, covering data manipulation, transformation, and analysis techniques.

Kafka.DESCRIPTION: Learn how to use Kafka Streams for real-time data processing, covering stream processing concepts, API usage, and application development.

Kafka.COURSE_NAME: Analyzing Streaming Data with Apache Kafka
Kafka.DESCRIPTION: Learn how to analyze streaming data with Apache Kafka, covering data ingestion, processing, and visualization techniques.
A beginner-friendly tutorial on Apache Kafka, covering the core concepts, architecture, and basic usage for building real-time data pipelines.

AWS.DESCRIPTION: This course introduces the basic concepts of cloud computing and AWS services, covering compute, storage, and networking.
Learn the fundamentals of AWS cloud computing, including services, security, architecture, and pricing models.

AWS.COURSE_NAME: AWS Tutorial For Beginners | AWS Full Course - Learn AWS In 10 Hours | AWS Training | Edureka
AWS.DESCRIPTION: An in-depth tutorial covering AWS services and their applications, including compute, storage, databases, and security.

Azure.COURSE_NAME: Microsoft Azure Fundamentals AZ-900 Exam Prep Specialization
Azure.DESCRIPTION: Learn the fundamentals of Microsoft Azure, including cloud concepts, core Azure services, security, and pricing.
Learn the foundational concepts of Microsoft Azure, including cloud services, security, compliance, and management tools.

Azure.COURSE_NAME: Azure Tutorial for Beginners | Microsoft Azure Full Course - Learn Azure in 8 Hours | Edureka
Azure.DESCRIPTION: A comprehensive tutorial on Microsoft Azure, covering various services and their applications, including compute, storage, databases, and networking.

Google Cloud.DESCRIPTION: Learn the fundamental concepts of Google Cloud Platform (GCP), including compute, storage, networking, and identity management.

Google Cloud.COURSE_NAME: Google Cloud Platform Fundamentals: Core Infrastructure
Google Cloud.DESCRIPTION: An introductory course to Google Cloud Platform, covering the core services, infrastructure, and management tools.

Google Cloud.COURSE_NAME: Google Cloud Platform (GCP) Tutorial - Full Course for Beginners
Google Cloud.DESCRIPTION: A comprehensive tutorial on Google Cloud Platform (GCP), covering various services and their applications, including compute, storage, databases, and networking.

TensorFlow.DESCRIPTION: Learn to build and train neural networks using TensorFlow, covering topics such as convolutional neural networks, recurrent neural networks, and sequence models.
Learn how to use TensorFlow for data processing and model deployment, covering data ingestion, feature engineering, and deployment strategies.
A beginner-friendly tutorial on TensorFlow, covering the core concepts, architecture, and basic usage for building neural networks.

PyTorch.DESCRIPTION: Learn the fundamentals of deep learning using PyTorch, covering topics such as neural networks, convolutional neural networks, and recurrent neural networks.
This course provides a broad introduction to AI with a focus on using Python and PyTorch to build AI models and applications.
A comprehensive tutorial on PyTorch, covering the core concepts, architecture, and basic usage for building neural networks.

MLOps.DESCRIPTION: This specialization covers the principles and practices of MLOps, including model deployment, monitoring, and maintenance.
Learn the basics of MLOps, including model deployment, monitoring, and continuous integration/continuous delivery (CI/CD) pipelines.

MLOps.COURSE_NAME: MLOps Full Course | Machine Learning Operations | MLOps Tutorial For Beginners | Simplilearn
MLOps.DESCRIPTION: A comprehensive tutorial on MLOps, covering the key concepts, tools, and techniques for deploying and managing machine learning models in production.

Model Monitoring.DESCRIPTION: This course teaches how to monitor AI models for performance and fairness, including techniques for detecting and mitigating bias.
This courses features data science and machine learning tutorials along with data visualization, model monitoring and management techniques

Model Monitoring.COURSE_NAME: Model Monitoring in Production - Full Tutorial
Model Monitoring.DESCRIPTION: A tutorial on monitoring machine learning models in production, covering metrics, tools, and techniques for ensuring model performance.

Time Series Forecasting.DESCRIPTION: Learn the fundamentals of time series analysis, including techniques for forecasting, modeling, and prediction.
Learn how to apply data analytics techniques to optimize supply chain processes, including demand forecasting, inventory management, and logistics.

Time Series Forecasting.COURSE_NAME: Time Series Forecasting Theory | AR, MA, ARMA, ARIMA | Data Science
Time Series Forecasting.DESCRIPTION: A tutorial on time series forecasting, covering various models such as AR, MA, ARMA, and ARIMA.
